result.reason: mRemoteNG uses hardcoded theme colors for DockPanel tabs (DockPaneStripNG) that ignore Windows High Contrast mode, making tabs unreadable for accessibility users
result.approach: Detect SystemInformation.HighContrast at theme initialization and in DockPaneStripNG tab rendering; when active, override tab background/foreground colors with SystemColors (e.g., SystemColors.Window, SystemColors.WindowText) instead of hardcoded theme palette values
